title: KickDudes
text: Witchaiwat Sakunthongaram, back-end Inspiration: "We are a new company comprised of people who have been in the IT business for more than 15 years, and we all decided to come up with a new innovation. I have been working without rest for two weeks on this application, before submitting it for True Incube 2014. We were part of the last 10 teams. KickDudes is meant for those who want to play football, but are not free at the same time or are in different places. Our application also helps football field owners to cut down on the time their fields are left idle," said the founder Khomkrid Lerdprasert. Records: Winner in E-Inclusion and E-Community Category, Thailand ICT Awards 2015. One of the top 10 team finalists, True Incube 2014. Fun facts 17 football field owners have shown interest in the application. Current move AIS Startup 2015 Audition round as well as setting up a prototype field. Next move Expanding prototype fields within Bangkok. Goal Aim to expand across Asia and build football communities in other countries. 193 Viewed
